remarks: Definition of line in terms of original lattice elements.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isline4.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isline4.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
isline4.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
isline4.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
isline4.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
isline4N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( M ` X ) e. N <-> E. p e. A p C X ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d K p $.
$d M p $.
$d X p $.
